title: Troubleshooting Common Issues
description: Solutions for common technical problems with JOYIN.

faqs.question: The app keeps crashing. What should I do?
faqs.answer:
Try these steps:
  1. Force close and restart: Swipe away the app from your recent apps and reopen it
  2. Check for updates: Make sure you have the latest version from the app store
  3. Clear cache: Go to your device settings > Apps > JOYIN > Storage > Clear Cache
  4. Reinstall: As a last resort, uninstall and reinstall the app (your data is safe on our servers)
If problems persist, contact our support team.

faqs.question: I can't upload photos or videos. Why?
faqs.answer:
Upload issues are usually related to:
  • File size: Ensure your media is under 100MB
  • File format: We support JPG, PNG, GIF, MP4, and MOV formats
  • Permissions: Make sure JOYIN has permission to access your photos/videos
  • Connection: Check your internet connection strength
  • Storage space: Ensure you have enough storage on your device

faqs.question: Why am I not receiving notifications?
faqs.answer:
Notification issues can be caused by:
  • App permissions: Check that JOYIN has notification permissions enabled in your device settings
  • In-app settings: Go to JOYIN Settings > Notifications to customize which notifications you receive
  • Battery optimization: Some devices restrict background activity for battery saving
  • Do Not Disturb: Check if Do Not Disturb mode is enabled on your device

faqs.question: I forgot my password. How do I reset it?
faqs.answer: On the login screen, tap 'Forgot Password'. Enter the email or phone number associated with your account, and we'll send you a password reset link. Make sure to check your spam folder if you don't see the email.

faqs.question: My feed isn't updating with new content
faqs.answer:
If your feed seems stuck:
  • Pull to refresh: Swipe down from the top of your feed to refresh
  • Check connection: Ensure you have a stable internet connection
  • Update the app: Make sure you're on the latest version
  • Following activity: If you're new, you may need to follow more people to see content

faqs.question: I'm having trouble with direct messages
faqs.answer:
For DM issues:
  • Recipient blocked: You can't message someone who has blocked you
  • Message requests: Messages from people you don't follow go to message requests
  • Media in DMs: Ensure you have permission to send/receive media in messages
  • Group messages: Group chats support up to 50 participants
